description: This simple salmon curry comes together quickly for a delicious, light midweek dinner.
keywords: Salmon With Green Pea Curry & Rice Noodles
name: Salmon With Green Pea Curry & Rice Noodles Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Divide the pea sauce between four wide bowls and top each with noodles and salmon. Finish with chopped spring onion tips, a squeeze of lime juice and the remaining coriander and serve.
